content.p: A history degree prepares you for a wide range of professions. Some of the most popular industries which our graduates move into include: Read our graduate profiles Critical thinking Data analysis Source interpretation Independent research Constructing logical arguments Objective thinking More on History degree skills A history degree offers an ideal foundation to a career in teaching. Top tips: A good grounding in the breadth of history is helpful Our undergraduate core module ‘Learning History’ gives you the necessary awareness of the disciplinary underpinnings of history It’s useful if you’ve taken a module considering a more global perspective of history Our secondary PGCE History course Get specialist advice from subject-specific careers experts in our Careers and Employability Service.
